ID - SPELL ID

MP - MP / SP USED UP

SD - CASTING SPEED

PW - POWER OF SPELL

TG - TARGET 	 
		51 = DMG ON E
		52 = AOE DMG ON E
		53 = DMG ON ALL E
		58 = BUFF ON SELF
		59 = DMG ON E
		5A = AOE DMG ON E
		5B = DMG ON ALL E
		60 = ALL EX CASTER 
		61 = BUFF ON A
		62 = AOE BUFF ON A
		6B = HEAL ON ALL A
		6D = BUFF ON ONE A
		E1 = HEAL ON A
		E3 = HEAL ON ALL A
		
RD - RADIUS

EL - ELEMENT
		10 - FIRE
		20 - WATER
		40 - WIND
		80 - EARTH
		50 = THUNDER
		60 = ICE
		90 = BOOM
		A0 = WOOD

WP - WEAPON
		1 - KNIFE
		2 - SWORD
		4 - MACE
		8 - AXE
		10 - WHIP
		20 - THROW

ET - EFFECT TYPE
		0 - RECOVERY ( STATS )
		3 - DAMAGE
		5 - DEBUFF ( STATUS )
		6 - RECOVERY ( STATUS )
		7 - DEBUFF ( STATS )
		8 - MP DRAIN
		9 - STATUS CHANGE ( OTHER )

ET - EFFECT KIND
	UNCLEAR, do not mess with it for now

ATKIP - Unclear, probably IP knockback related
EX - EXP, Unclear how it is distributed, could be a multiplier of mob lvl
V1 - in the debug menu labeled as ext_com, unclear what it does
CR - CRITICAL CHANCE
WALK - Unknown, but related to the fact if you execute on the spot or have to be close up to the enemy
AC - Act Animation, The actual ANIMATION of the spell. Use Caution when changing this. Crosscheck Spelldata to see which spell has what animation ID
OUT_TYPE - Unknown, all spells have 0, unused data
IC - Icon Number. Spells however do not have Icons, unused data. Probably leftovers from BETA
?? - Japanese description I cannot figure out
